title: Enroll Employee in Training
description: A manager wants to enroll their employee in an upcoming 'Leadership Skills' training course.

tasks.description: Identify the employee and the desired training course in the Learning Management System (LMS).
tasks.expected_outcome: L&D specialist identifies the employee and the course.

tasks.description: Check for available seats in the upcoming course session.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist confirms there are open seats.

tasks.description: Enroll the employee in the course and send a confirmation to the employee and their manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist successfully enrolls the employee and sends notifications.
